level.heading: Fixing amount necessary for redemption after action to foreclose filed.

level.text: If the real property is redeemed after an action to foreclose the right of redemption is filed and there is a dispute regarding redemption, the person redeeming may apply to the Superior Court for an order fixing the amount necessary for redemption in accordance with the provisions of this chapter.
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, the Mayor may accept a payment for redemption without an order of court.

If there is a dispute regarding redemption, the Mayor shall not accept a payment for redemption unless a certified copy of the order of court fixing the amount necessary for redemption is filed with the Mayor.
